options.text: Create two App Registrations(1.Single Tenant and 2.MultiTenant) and provide their information in the below respective fields. Once the deployment is complete, you will see URL's in the output which needs to be added to the Redirect URI of your MultiTenant App Registration. Click on this box to watch/learn more about deploying this offer.

basics.name: webAppNamePrefix
basics.label: Resource Name Prefix
basics.toolTip: The resources(Appservices, SQL and etc) created during the deployment will be prefixed by this value.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.

basics.name: TenantID
basics.label: Tenant ID
basics.toolTip: Use the TenantId of the App Registration you created for the Single Tenant App Registration. You will also use this value in your SaaS Offer technical configuration. Please see Deployment output.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-50 characters long.

basics.name: ADApplicationID
basics.label: Single Tenant AppReg App(client) ID
basics.toolTip: This is the App(client) ID of the Single Tenant App registration. You will also use this value in your SaaS Offer technical configuration. Please see Deployment output.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-50 characters long.

basics.name: ADApplicationSecret
basics.toolTip: This is the secret created for the above(Single Tenant) App Registration

basics.name: ADMTApplicationID
basics.label: Multi Tenant AppReg App(client) ID
basics.toolTip: This is the AppId of the Multi Tenant App registration which supports the login of the WebApps created as part of this deployment. You will need to update the App Reg Redirect URIs after this deployment is complete. Please see Deployment output for the Redirect URIs.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-50 characters long.

basics.name: PublisherAdminUsers
basics.label: Publisher Portal Admin User
basics.toolTip: This will be the Admin users of the Publisher portal webapp as this is only for the publishers to manage the SaaS Offer. You can always add more Admin users in the Publisher portal UI.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-50 characters long.

basics.name: AadSqlAdminUsers
basics.label: Azure AD SQL Admin User
basics.toolTip: The admin user Azure AD account for the SQL server

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-50 characters long.

basics.name: AadAdminObjectId
basics.label: Azure AD SQL Admin User ObjectId
basics.toolTip: Go to Azure AD -> Users -> Select the User account that was used as the SQL Admin User above -> Copy the Object ID

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-50 characters long.
